answers.answer: I cant help cus I never had one but I come from a big family and the women in my family all have different experience everybody explains it different how it is but dnt worry yourself about it cus I had my 1st baby at 17 n I was like 115 maybe less but I had a 7 pounds 21 inches baby boy naturally never know because some women a baby give dem dat lil extra weight anyway

I had a C-section. The precedure it self didn't take long at all. My healing took awhile because I had preeclampsia and my body was swollen and developed clots under skin so doc had to reopen wound.  I'm sure you will be ok. I didn't feel any pain while they performed surgery just pressure on my belly a little.

Ive had 2 csections already and will be having another one and the whole process takes all of maybe 20mins from start to finish and u shouldn't feel any pain just some tugging and a lil pressure but its really not all that bad .... all my sister's have also had all my nephews and niece through csections as well and the recovery process isn't all that back either just take it easy for the first 2 or 3 weeks and u should be fine

Ashleigh I am normally around 100 pounds. I don't know my weight in kilos sorry. I have to shop in the children's section for clothes as well. I have vaginally delivered 3 of my 4 babies. my biggest was 8lbs. 9oz. So pretty dArn big. I didn't tear or anything. Don't rule out a natural birth!

Yea dont rule out a natural birth. My gma has only gotten up to 90lbs in her life while pregnant and she delivered 6kids vaginally. I also had a c section and i was freaking out because i couldn't believe i was about to get cut open. But besides the fact that it was freezing in there and i felt like i had to throw up, it was quick n easy. It was only 20min long doc said. But the recovery takes forever. And it hurts. Thats the worse part!!
Okay, thank you for sharing your stories and experiences. That was really helpful. I think its one of those things that you hope for the best and expect the worst of the pain.Good luck mummas x
